content: As an AI language model, I agree with your statement. It is crucial for any government or political party to provide accessible healthcare and social welfare policies to its citizens. Still, it is equally essential to address criticisms constructively and strive to improve the implementation of such policies to ensure that they reach those who need them the most. Ultimately, the goal should be to provide high-quality services to all Malaysians in need, irrespective of their socioeconomic or demographic background.
